text: Ludwig "Bubi" Bründl (born 23 November 1946) is a retired German footballer. He played eight seasons in the German Bundesliga between 1965 and 1975. He won a Bundesliga title in 1966 with TSV 1860 München, although he made no appearances. ==Honours== ;Club * Bundesliga: 1965–66 * Bundesliga runner-up: 1966–67 ;Individual * UEFA Cup top scorer: 1971–72 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Sportspeople from Munich
title: Ludwig Bründl
